detail_desc: V-neck top in soft slub jersey with short sleeves, a seam centre back and a rounded hem. Longer at the back.

Long shirt in a Tencel™ lyocell weave with buttons down the front and at the cuffs. Rounded hem with slits in the sides, slightly longer at the back.
Sleeveless dress in woven fabric with pleats around the neckline, and a V-neck at the back with a horizontal strap across the top. Unlined.
Tunic in an airy cotton weave with a collar and buttons at the top, short cap sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups and a rounded hem.
Tunic in an airy cotton weave with a collar and buttons at the top, short cap sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups and a rounded hem.
Small shoulder bag in shimmering metallic imitation leather. Narrow adjustable shoulder strap and handle at the top, and two zipped compartments. Lined. Size 5.5x11x15 cm.
Calf-length, lace pencil skirt with grosgrain ribbon at the waist, a concealed zip and button at the side and a slit at the back. Lined.
V-neck top in a double layer of crêpe with narrow shoulder straps that cross at the back. Gently flared style.
V-neck top in a double layer of crêpe with narrow shoulder straps that cross at the back. Gently flared style.
V-neck top in a double layer of crêpe with narrow shoulder straps that cross at the back. Gently flared style.
Metal keyring with a carabiner hook and soft faux fur pompom. Diameter 5 cm, length approx. 12 cm.

Sleeveless, backless satin jumpsuit with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps that cross at the back, a concealed zip in the side and wide, ankle-length legs. Lined.
Shaping briefs in microfibre with a lined gusset, high waist with a laser-cut edge, and wide lace trims at the hems. Light shaping effect on the waist, hips and bum.

Lace shortie briefs with a mid waist, lined gusset, low-cut legs and cutaway coverage at the back.
Lace shortie briefs with a mid waist, lined gusset, low-cut legs and cutaway coverage at the back.
CONSCIOUS EXCLUSIVE. Calf-length dress in organic silk with a V-neck and narrow shoulder straps. Gentle flare to the hem with a wide, asymmetric flounce. Unlined.

CONSCIOUS EXCLUSIVE. Straight-cut blouse in a textured silk and organic cotton weave with an opening with a button at the back of the neck and asymmetric cut at the waist. Long sleeves with flared, buttoned cuffs and a wide flounce on one sleeve. Frayed edges.
Ribbed top in a soft, fine knit with long sleeves and a low-cut back with a twisted detail.
Jacket in soft printed thermal fleece with a stand-up collar and concealed zip down the front. Unlined.
Padded gilet with a detachable, padded hood, stand-up collar and zip down the front. Rounded hem. Lined.

Padded jacket in wind- and water-repellent functional fabric with a detachable, fleece-lined hood with a faux fur trim. Ribbed collar, diagonal zip down the front, a front pocket with a hook and loop fastening, and long raglan sleeves with ribbed cuffs. Fleece lining. The jacket has a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.
Bikini briefs in cotton jersey with lace trims, a low waist, lined gusset and medium coverage at the back.
Bikini briefs in cotton jersey with lace trims, a low waist, lined gusset and medium coverage at the back.
Bikini briefs in cotton jersey with lace trims, a low waist, lined gusset and medium coverage at the back.

CONSCIOUS EXCLUSIVE. Calf-length skirt in sturdy, bonded, patterned fabric made from recycled polyester containing organic silk and viscose. Concealed zip in the side and an asymmetric hem with a wide, flared flounce. Unlined.
